basa_mp3_player.jcr:title: Basa MP3 Player
basa_mp3_player.summary: Carries up to 20,000 of your favorite tunes! Also features built in timer and workout monitor to track your energy and calories.

eqrusubpe.jcr:title: BPA-Free Water Bottle
eqrusubpe.features: Bottle is made with premium polycarbonate that is toxin free; inner surface is finished with an electrolyte charge and dolomitic sand blasting; finish is completely BPA free Certified food-grade polypropylene threaded opening and screw-top lid create a spill-resistant seal; food-grade silicon gasket is used inside the lid to help prevent leaks Shaped body features a narrow point near the neck of the bottle for easy grasping
eqrusubpe.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.
eqrusubpe.summary: BPA-free, our water bottle water bottle gives you quick access to hydration while at the gym or on the trail.

eqrusufle.jcr:title: Fleet Cross-Training Shoe
eqrusufle.features: Quicklace_ lacing system takes just 1 pull for a perfect fit; lace pocket hides lacing away Protective toe and heel caps guard against bumps and abrasion frames run along the soles of the shoes to facilitate better heel-to-toe transitions Triple-density EVA midsoles isolate you from trail impacts, and thermoplastic urethane inserts provide a barrier against sharp rocks underfoot
eqrusufle.reviews: By ohsooocute from Reseda, Ca I do lots of trail walking in the San Gabriel Mountains. These shoes were comfortable from the start. I like the quick lacing system because my shoes stay tied the way I want from the start. They are lightweight, yet sturdy. Thanks mum for thr great birthday present.
eqrusufle.summary: The Fleet Cross-Training shoes provide an ideal platform for high-mileage runners looking for 1 pair of shoes to take them from the street to the trail and back again.

eqrusugor.jcr:title: GoMobile Fitness Monitor/Smart Music Player
eqrusugor.features: GPS tracks your speed and distance while you run, walk and bike outdoors; built-in accelerometer tracks your speed, distance and steps taken during indoor workouts 8 gigabyte memory lets you load your favorite music; built-in FM tuner picks up local radio stations Smart music player learns which songs help you run faster and burn more calories, and then compiles them into a high-performance playlist
eqrusugor.reviews:
By Texas Runner from Dallas, TX
Battery life without GPS may be decent, but isn't the GPS tracking why someone would buy this device? It is completely worthless for marathon runners (and even some half marathon runners). Using GPS, but without music or bluetooth, I couldn't get more than 3 hours of battery life out of it while running.
If you're a casual short distance runner/cyclist looking for an iPod that also measures speed/distance then maybe this will work for you. If you're training for longer distances, you will be extremely disappointed.
eqrusugor.summary: The GoMobile fitness monitor and smart music player tracks your performance and pumps out tunes to keep you going.

spixa_runners.jcr:description: Featuring our latest mesh technology for ultimate flexibility. Memory foam cushion hugs your feet in support during those long cross country runs.
spixa_runners.jcr:title: Spixa Runners
spixa_runners.summary: Featuring our latest mesh technology for ultimate flexibility.  Memory foam cushion hugs your feet in support during those long cross country runs.
